io.smudgr.extensions.kinect.source

Class KinectSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smudgr.extensions.kinect.source.KinectSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProjectItem, ReflectableType, Source
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DepthSource, VideoSource

    public abstract class KinectSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements Source
    The KinectSource allows using Kinect buffers as an input Source
